alternativeNames: Pring, George Henry; Pring, George Harry E.
comments: After his migration from U.K. to USA, Pring might have changed his middle name Henry to Harry
examples: Nymphaea burttii Pring & Woodson, Ann. Missouri Bot. Gard. 20(1): 1. 1933
notes: Ray Desmond (Dict. Brit. Irish Botanists 565. 1994) cited the middle name as Henry; as per his USA passport application made in 1923 and the registration card (for the WW-I 1917-1921), his middle name is Harry
source: Letter from A. Hansen 17.4.80; photocopies of Pring's passport application and registration card from: Janet Hix
